aboutPage.ourMissionDescription: We want to empower entrepreneurs. They should be able to focus on their business, not on bureaucratic paperwork. This is why we want to establish a new, state-of-the-art tool to manage, exchange, and trade securities in private companies. Our goal is to make shares management a breeze for both companies and shareholders.
aboutPage.timo: Computer vision background, badminton guy, wants to build a space elevator
aboutPage.yoko: Medical physics background, loves running, wondering about brain-machine interfaces

contactPage.giveUsACall: Give us a call or stop by our door anytime. We will do our best to answer all enquiries within 24 hours on business days.
contactPage.hereAreTheWays: Here are the ways you can contact us with any questions you have

convertibles: Convertible notes and employee stock options
convertiblesDescription: You create convertible notes, Ledgy takes care of all the calculations. Enter employee incentive plans with vesting and track them over time.
description: Having headaches with your cap table in Excel? Make your life easy with Ledgy.
export: Export PDFs and send tax certificates
exportDescription: Per Swiss law, a share register must be signed by the board of directors to be valid. For this purpose, it can be exported as a PDF. Automatically generate tax certificates and send them to your shareholders.
keywords: cap table, stock ledger, shares register, simulation, round modeling, equity
roundModelingDesc: Plan investment rounds by simulating their effect on the cap table.
shareholderLoginDescription: Your shareholders will be able to see all of their investments at any time on Ledgy.
straightforwardTool: As straightforward as the tool. One package, everything included.
switzerlandsBestCompanies: Switzerland’s best companies manage their cap table with Ledgy.
title: Online Cap Table
wereWorkingHard: We’re working hard to bring new features online for you in the next couple of months!
